html:
12.13.18  5:22 pm   If you see (for example) A-... does that mean Amin or Amin7? 

     Amin

12.13.18  4:54 pm   what is your favourite unit of measurement?

     planck

12.13.18  4:16 pm    why are humans so susceptible to magical thinking?

     because our entire selves and the universe we are living in are made of magic

12.13.18  3:48 pm   what should i get for my birthday

     older!

12.13.18  2:44 pm   i've been thinking about which instrument is the most powerful & effective and i've narrowed it down to 2, piano and voice. on piano you can play more than one note at once, you can be a one man band, you can't do that while singing but you can say words. you can combine language and music together. what's your opinion on this

     that's pretty good, a lot of people do a very similar thing with an acoustic guitar+voice, instead of a piano. and that works very well too. some interesting advantages/disadvantages to each

12.13.18  2:38 pm   why is music so powerful

     it knows how your mind works

12.13.18  1:46 pm   what's the best?

     very good

12.13.18  12:47 pm   Are you starting to feel somewhat caught up and back on track at this point?

     i am around 89% sure i am back on track. by the way the track is faster now

     Did you just shift the two week schedule forward a week?

     no

     Are every other Tuesdays still the target release date or are you making a new schedule now?

     it will be the same schedule but hopefully with some slight additions

12.13.18  12:23 pm   Is pain necessary to create great art?

     maybe not

12.13.18  12:13 pm   why did you make "how to win at spelling" if you didn't want to release it?

     i made it for someone else to release

12.13.18  10:44 am   what's the best use of excessive marmalade 

     i have never used marmalade, i'm actually not too sure what it is, but i suspect it to be some type of goo

12.13.18  10:08 am   I've screwed up really big. What should I do?

     how about a big fix, or a steady series of small fixes

12.13.18  9:25 am   Did you smoke marijuana in California and lose your schedule groove? Or you think it was just traveling to the podcast in general that threw you off? Not trying to be mean just curious. Hope you are well, Bill. You are a strong dude

     the trip had nothing to do with it. i have had longer business trips during the 2 week schedule and still came out fine. what happened was, i've now reached the point where i am very excited to add non-song content to the schedule, and doing it without reducing the 2 week song schedule. trying to implement these changes for tues 12/4 resulted in spectacular failure, as i missed not only 12/4 but the normally scheduled 12/11 also. disasterous but i am getting back up and still making those additions

12.13.18  8:18 am   did you know that you are a beautiful ray of sunshine?

     we all are

12.13.18  7:10 am   Do you have or are you going to get a real christmas tree, an artificial christmas tree or no tree at all?

      i already have a very small fake one

12.13.18  5:11 am   Do you think the "6 Days to Air" documentary is a healthy portrayal of how to get stuff done efficiently? Or are they going overboard with it a bit?

     they're just trying to get the job done ...... although the mcdonald's seems like an unnecessary kick in the stomach/brain when you're trying to write scenes

12.13.18  3:31 am   12.11.18  5:14 pm How do you know when you've broken them enough?

     you'll never know, and even if you figure it out you would have to change it

12.13.18  2:57 am   why are you so good

     there is a certain soap i use

12.13.18  1:32 am   what part of history do you think draws people in the most for learning

     knights templar

12.13.18  1:12 am   dancing seems like a silly thing to do until the music makes me want to do it, how bout you 

     that reminds me of the entire universe

12.13.18  12:42 am   Can you make a breakdown into your video editing process / song writing/recording process? It'd be very interesting to watch! 

     i will do it

12.13.18  12:27 am   Why is your music so amazing.

     perhaps it is the devil's music

12.12.18  11:18 pm   why are all your songs random?

     they are not

12.12.18  9:16 pm   What is your main goal in life?

     understand it

12.12.18  9:07 pm   is it ok to be weird?

     even better

12.12.18  9:04 pm   is capitalism?

     sure

12.12.18  7:30 pm   do you ever think about the fourth dimension?

     it's not entirely clear to me what that would be

12.12.18  5:53 pm   Has anyone ever asked you a question that was just crazy?? lol

     not really

12.12.18  5:35 pm   what is the "i'm feeling randy" on the top right of the questions page?

     that will take you to the randomized questions page, where you can view randomly selected questions

12.12.18  5:10 pm   what's your favorite thing about the internet?

     the access

12.12.18  5:02 pm   You raised an interesting point on the podcast re there always being good music in the charts. I wanted to test it out but I couldn't find any playlists anywhere to listen to them in order. I went to Wikipedia and started building them by hand but it was impossible, so I wrote a script to do it for me

https://gist.github.com/darajava/7e4b19116ed82afaf43282e0601e104f

It's actually very interesting to go through them. I'm on 1958 currently, some smashing tunes. Thanks for the idea!

     playback.fm is a very convenient site for listening to charts

12.12.18  4:57 pm   what is your opinion on trees

     they are like the godzilla version of plants

12.12.18  4:56 pm   Is the different style of your videos / music intentional? Or do not you bother with it and only do it because you like things that way?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

12.12.18  4:46 pm   is the Truth objective or subjective? why or why not?

     i forget which one means which

12.12.18  4:12 pm   why is thoughtlessness so dangerous?

     you are vulnerable to external attacks of thoughtfulness

12.12.18  4:09 pm   would you please make a new day of the week

     no

12.12.18  3:19 pm   Do you know how to play the accordion?

     not really

     What do you think of the accordion?

     it might be heavy but i have never lifted it

12.12.18  2:55 pm   Why do true words feel truer when they come from someone else

     because it's a surprise

12.12.18  2:50 pm   Do you think the 432 / 440 debate is important?

     no

12.12.18  1:40 pm   did the big bang really happen?

     maybe

12.12.18  12:55 pm   Does it ever happen to you to feel tempted to write down a certain melody or rhythm but then remember you've heard something very similar in a song but you can't remember which one and then try to discard the idea?

     no, at least wait until i can find the match

12.12.18  12:49 pm   when was yes inventd

     about 14 billion years ago

12.12.18  12:14 pm   Do you use healthy singing techniques

     maybe

12.12.18  12:06 pm   if you are trying to be reasonable, then what is unreasonable for you?

     destroying a perfectly good universe

12.12.18  12:04 pm   How does one creat a cardboard box 

     plant a small piece of cardboard in the ground, water it,

12.12.18  12:02 pm   what the last book you gave up on and stopped reading?

     the terms and conditions

12.12.18  12:01 pm   Have you ever had a vocal teacher? I'm just curious.

     no

12.12.18  11:55 am   What age do you interested in music?

     every

12.12.18  11:39 am   Do we have a free will,

     sure

      or are we just products of our environment? 

     maybe more

12.12.18  11:13 am   HOW DOES IT FEEL TO BE AN ENEMY OF THE CAPITAL LETTER ORGANIZATION?

     i don't know, i am not
